title: Which is best for education, north India or South India? - Quora

response.answer_text: Neither. Education is provided by institutions and not geographical locations. If you have an IIT in Delhi, there is one in Chennai too. If there is an IIM at Lucknow, there is one at Bengaluru too. Academically bright students come from all over. However, if you do wish to know which city/state has the best institutes for education, consider this: Ahmedabad (Gujarat) and Gandhinagar boast of: IIT (engineering)IIM (management)NID (design)NIFT (fashion technology)GNLU (law)IHM (hotel management)CEPT (env. planning and tech)MICA (mass comm)BJ Medical (medicine)NHL Medical (medicine)PDPU (engg. / liberal studies)DAIICT (engineering)and many such colleges of National repute!

Devoted teachers who keep updating their knowledge of the subject they teach and bright students who thirst for knowledge. These are the two essential basics of education. Add to this, well-equipped science labs and computer labs for gaining practical knowledge. In this kind of environment, leave alone the bright students, even the not-so-bright students will be benefit. Let our governments, central and state, and private educational instituions, strive to give the best education to all our students in the south, north, west and the east of the country. Let us not make a distinction here.
